meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Relax</kanji> in <kanji>peace</kanji>. Wherever you are that's allowing you to do this, it is certainly <vocabulary>peace</vocabulary>. You feel <vocabulary>security</vocabulary> too.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
